property.name: grill.drivers
property.description: Drivers enabled for this grill server instance

property.name: grill.servicenames
property.description: These services would be started in the specified order when grill-server starts up

property.name: grill.session.service.impl
property.description: Implementation class for session service

property.name: grill.query.service.impl
property.description: Implementation class for query execution service

property.name: grill.quota.service.impl
property.description: Implementation class for quota service

property.name: grill.metastore.service.impl
property.description: Implementation class for metastore service

property.name: grill.scheduler.service.impl
property.description: Implementation class for query scheduler service

property.name: grill.server.base.url
property.description: The base url for the grill server

property.name: grill.persistent.resultset
property.description: Whether to enable persistent resultset for queries

property.name: grill.result.parent.dir
property.description: The directory for storing persisted results

property.name: grill.add.insert.overwrite
property.description: Prefix query with insert overwrite clause if the query is persistent. User can disable if user gave the clause himself.

property.name: grill.result.output.dir.format
property.description: The format of the output if result is persisted. The format should be expressed in HQL

property.name: grill.query.state.logger.enabled
property.description: Disable or enable the query state logger with this config. The location for the logger can be specified in log4j properties for the class com.inmobi.grill.server.query.QueryExecutionServiceImpl.QueryStatusLogger

property.name: grill.event.service.thread.pool.size
property.description: The size of thread pool for notifying events. The no value is specified, it uses the available processors as the number.

property.name: grill.enable.console.metrics
property.description: Enable metrics to be reported on console

property.name: grill.enable.ganglia.metrics
property.description: Enable metrics to be reported on ganglia

property.name: grill.metrics.ganglia.host
property.description: The ganglia host name

property.name: grill.metrics.ganglia.port
property.description: The ganglia port

property.name: grill.metrics.reporting.period
property.description: The reporting period for metrics. The value is in seconds

property.name: grill.server.restart.enabled
property.description: If restart is enabled, all the services will be started from last saved state, if disabled all the services will start afresh

property.name: grill.server.persist.location
property.description: Grill server will persist its state in this location when it is going down. Will read from here when it is restarted and restart is enabled.
